items.sentence: I want you to know that I meant every word I said.
Even if Tom had invited me, I wouldn\'t have gone.
It\'s hard to figure out who\'s telling the truth.
It\'s likely that Tom didn\'t finish his homework.
Tom might possibly have been the one who did that.
Tom wants to teach his children the value of work.
What\'re you doing sitting here alone in the dark?
What\'s the big deal? People do this all the time.
What\'s the difference between lions and leopards?
What\'s the fastest way to get to the post office?
